table.caption: Description of configuration options for hyperv

tr.td: (StrOpt)The name of a Windows share name mapped to the "instances_path" dir and used by the resize feature to copy files to the target host. If left blank, an administrative share will be used, looking for the same "instances_path" used locally
(BoolOpt)Required for live migration among hosts with different CPU features
(StrOpt)qemu-img is used to convert between different image types
(StrOpt)External virtual switch Name, if not provided, the first external virtual switch is used
